argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_cshwcl | |- ( W e. Word A -> ( W cyclShift N ) e. Word A ) |
| 2 |  | #P_wrdf | |- ( ( W cyclShift N ) e. Word A -> ( W cyclShift N ) : ( 0 ..^ ( # ` ( W cyclShift N ) ) ) --> A ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_syl | |- ( W e. Word A -> ( W cyclShift N ) : ( 0 ..^ ( # ` ( W cyclShift N ) ) ) --> A ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( W e. Word A /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( W cyclShift N ) : ( 0 ..^ ( # ` ( W cyclShift N ) ) ) --> A ) |
| 5 |  | #P_cshwlen | |- ( ( W e. Word A /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( # ` ( W cyclShift N ) ) = ( # ` W ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( W e. Word A /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( 0 ..^ ( # ` ( W cyclShift N ) ) ) = ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_feq2d | |- ( ( W e. Word A /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( W cyclShift N ) : ( 0 ..^ ( # ` ( W cyclShift N ) ) ) --> A <-> ( W cyclShift N ) : ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) --> A ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ( W e. Word A /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( W cyclShift N ) : ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) --> A ) |
